Uses of Interface
org.passay.MessageResolver

  • Packages that use MessageResolver 
    Package Description
    org.passay  
    org.passay.spring  

    • Uses of MessageResolver in org.passay

      Classes in org.passay that implement MessageResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractMessageResolver
      Provides a baseline implementation of AbstractMessageResolver.resolve(RuleResultDetail) which uses String.format(String, Object...) to resolve messages.
      class  PropertiesMessageResolver
      Resolves messages from rule result details from a properties file.
      class  ResourceBundleMessageResolver
      Resolves messages from rule result details from a resource bundle.
      Methods in org.passay that return MessageResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageResolver PasswordValidator.getMessageResolver()
      Returns the message resolver for this validator.
      Constructors in org.passay with parameters of type MessageResolver 
      Constructor and Description
      PasswordValidator(MessageResolver resolver, List<? extends Rule> rules)
      Creates a new password validator.
      PasswordValidator(MessageResolver resolver, Rule... rules)
      See PasswordValidator(MessageResolver, List).

    • Uses of MessageResolver in org.passay.spring

      Classes in org.passay.spring that implement MessageResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SpringMessageResolver
      Provides implementation for resolving validation message using Spring's MessageSource.
